title: Sam Smith TWERKS on NYC's Brooklyn Bridge and dances in the street after coming out as non-binary
text:
It's been less than a month since Sam Smith came out as non-binary, revealing to fans that they do not define themselves exclusively as masculine or feminine‍.

And the 27-year-old singer, who had initially admitted to being 'nervous' about making the announcement, appeared to be revelling in living their truth on Sunday, as they stepped out for a fun-filled outing in New York City with a group of pals.

The Dancing With A Stranger hitmaker took to Instagram to share footage of themselves twerking on the Big Apple's Brooklyn Bridge after dancing in the middle of the street in the bustling metropolis.

Fun-filled weekend: Sam Smith, who recently came out as non-binary, shared a series of shots and clips from their fun-filled weekend in New York City on Sunday

Dressed in a textured brown button-down shirt and dark skinny jeans, the London native also indulged in a spot of playful voguing while holding a fan.

Before stepping out for the day of lighthearted shenanigans, the star shared a shot of themselves wearing a tank top as they partied, presumably the night before.

Captioning the image, which showed the star sporting heavy eyeliner and showing a tattoo of two people kissing, they wrote: 'I love my friends.'

Vogue: The 27-year-old singer shared footage of themselves voguing on the Brooklyn Bridge

Off to twerk we go: As the posts continued, Sam showed themselves twerking on the bridge

Strike a pose: Sam used a fan as a prop as the group of friends playfully displayed their poses

Sam also recently entertained fans on Instagram with a post in which they shimmied their chest and sported a full face of expertly applied makeup.

The star, who could be seen clad in a hot pink jacket while pulling down their vest to expose a glittering chest, invited followers to gaze upon their 'disco t*ts'.

The Stay With Me Singer sported a bold gold eye shadow and false lashes as well as a slick of pink lipstick.

Sam's series of posts comes after they revealed their crush on pop heartthrob Harry Styles in a clip entitled My Teenage Self, shared by Hits Radio.

Dancing in the street: They also got into the spirit of things in the middle of the busy streets

Outfit: Before the shenanigans, the star shared a shot of themselves in their outfit for the day

Thank you for being a friend: Sam also posed with performance artist and activist Alok Vaid-Menon, who also identifies as non-binary

The singer couldn't keep their cool as they dubbed the former One Direction star 'so fit' while also declaring they 'lost their breath' after seeing him recently.

Opening up a box which was full of question for them to answer, Sam gushed: 'It says, "I love Harry Styles on it", and I do!'

Unable to contain their glee, they continued: 'I've seen him recently. He's so fit, like I lose my breath.'

When asked later in the interview who their celebrity crush was that they have yet to meet, they answered Shia LaBeouf.

Delightful: This comes after Sam delighted fans with a cheeky Instagram clip late last month

Getting it off their chest: Sam cheekily invited their followers to gaze upon their 'disco t*ts'

However, talk once again steered back to the Dunkirk actor, as they gushed: 'I've met him and he's better than what he looks like on TV. Sensational!'

Sam also confessed that they also thought Leonardo DiCaprio was 'stunning', adding: 'He came up to me just before Oscars and said, "Hello, I like your music." I said I liked him.'

Last month, Sam broke their silence on coming out as non-binary, as the singer told fans to refer to them using 'they/them' pronouns.

The How Do You Sleep? hitmaker announced their request in a candid statement shared via Twitter, in which they admitted they have been 'at war' with themselves for 'a lifetime' over how to define their gender.

It's just a little crush: Sam recently revealed their huge crush on Harry Styles in a clip entitled My Teenage Self, shared by Hits Radio

Attraction: The singer, 27, couldn't keep their cool as they dubbed former One Direction star Harry Styles 'so fit', while also declaring they 'lost their breath' after seeing him recently

'Stunning': The singer has also revealed crushes on (L-R) Shia LaBeouf and Leonardo DiCaprio

In the flurry of tweets, they wrote: 'Today is a good day so here goes. I’ve decided I am changing my pronouns to THEY/THEM after a lifetime of being at war with my gender I’ve decided to embrace myself for who I am, inside and out...

'I’m so excited and privileged to be surrounded by people that support me in this decision but I’ve been very nervous about announcing this because I care too much about what people think but f*** it!

'I understand there will be many mistakes and mis gendering but all I ask is you please please try. I hope you can see me like I see myself now. Thank you.'

A person who identifies as non-binary doesn't define themselves exclusively as masculine or feminine‍, and prefers they/them pronouns.

Earlier this year, the singer detailed their experience with their sexuality in an insightful interview with British GQ magazine to celebrate GQ Heroes, admitting to feeling like they don't really fit in, which made them 'really depressed and sad'.
description: It's been less than a month since Sam Smith came out as non-binary, revealing to fans that they do not define themselves exclusively as masculine or feminine‍.
